name: Studio Brand Collective
tagline: A digital+design Agency Delivering Measurable ROI
description:
Studio Brand Collective is a Houston digital marketing + design agency, specializing in digital media marketing strategies, implementation and analytics - SEO, PPC, Inbound Marketing, and advertising. We cater to the digital lifestyle. We create, execute and continually optimize campaigns that are local, relevant, social and multi-device.
Our team focuses the majority of their time on research, strategy creation, search engine optimization, search engine marketing, performance analytics, web design and development, video and motion graphics, social media marketing, content marketing, digital PR, email marketing, display advertising, managed media services, project management, and account management.
